dotnetType.name: ITypeResolverCase
dotnetType.remarks:
See the <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution" /> class for more information about the resolution
            framework.
dotnetType.summary:
Resolves information for specific .NET types. Used by <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolver" /> to break
            apart resolution logic.

returns.summary: A subclass of <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution" /> that contains information about the type.

overloads.summary:
Resolves information for a .NET type. If the case does not apply to the provided type,
            this method should throw <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" />.

typeSignatures.value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeResolverCase
